name: 李後燦
objective: 本科目旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1. 計算機系統簡介 2 . 資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯 3. 周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計 5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具 6. 資料結構與演算法 7. 作業系統 8. 檔案與資料庫 9. 資料通訊與計算機網路 10. 人工智慧 11. 新興技術介紹
schedule:
This introductory course covers the fundamentals and applications of computers. The major topics covered in this course are listed in weeks: 
1-2.Introduction to computer systems 
3-4.Data representation, number systems, and logic 
5-6.Peripherals and storage 
7-8. Programming languages and programming 
9-10. Data structures and algorithms 
11-12. Software engineering and system development tools 
13-14. Operating systems 8.File and database systems 
15. Data communication and computer networks 
16. Artificial intelligence 
17-18. Emerging techniques
